lines.text: I want to be a monster maker just like you. I want you to see my work.

[the Ultra Gorgon has Matt's Father]
Well, Matt, what do you want me to do?
Because, well, because... he's my Dad.
And she leant over and said "No, like this", and in one line she got his mouth right; that half-smile, half-sneer.

[Chancey hands over wads of cash from a safe for Matt's work]
You're mad.
